ENTRY.refkeywords: xsrdblur rdblur load_rdblur diskline x-spec xspec convolution model experimental
ENTRY.SYNOPSIS: convolve with the dislkine model shape. XSpec convolution model *Experimental*.

DESC.PARA: A convolution model to smooth a spectrum by relatavistic effects from an accretion disk around a non-rotating black hole. Modified from diskline model (Fabian et al. MNRAS 238, 729) by Andy Fabian and Roderick Johnstone.

ROW.DATA: Index: power law dependence of emissivity (scales as R^Index). If this parameter is 10 or greate then the accretion disk emissivity law (1-sqrt(6/R))/R^3 is used.

DESC.PARA: Please see ahelp xsconvolve for information on how to load the model.

LIST.CAPTION: Notes
LIST.ITEM: This is an experimental release of the convolution models; please take care when using this model.

DESC.PARA: This information is taken from the XSpec User's Guide. Version 12.10.0e of the XSpec models is supplied with CIAO 4.11.
The powerlaw and gaussian components are convolved by the rdblur model, with the inner radius set to 10.
